RoadDisruption.Comments: A201 Farringdon Road (All Directions) between Cowcross Street and Charterhouse Street - Cowcross Street is closed for Crossrail works. Farringdon Road is restricted southbound.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Delays possible, especially at peak times.

RoadDisruption.Comments: Cannon Street (EC4) (Eastbound) between Bread Street and Queen Victoria Street - Lane one (of two) will be closed for building works. Additionally, Cannon Street is closed eastbound between Queen Victoria Street and King William Street during collaborative utilities works.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Delays possible, especially during peak periods.

RoadDisruption.Comments: A406 Fore Street Tunnel (Both Directions) - From 19th May 2014 to 31st October 2015 tunnel closures overnight (2200hrs to 0530hrs Monday to Friday only) to facilitate refurbishment works. In addition, weekend closures of the tunnel, in both directions, (2200hrs Friday to 0530hrs Monday) are scheduled for the weekend starting Friday 13th February. Please click here for more information.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Tunnel has been reopened. Traffic is flowing well.

RoadDisruption.Comments: [A4209] Sussex Gardens (W2 ) (All Directions) at the junction of Spring Street - Road closed to facilitate Crossrail tunnelling works and subsequently Thames Water works.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Use an alternative route. Expect minor delays.

RoadDisruption.Comments: [A1] Holloway Road (N19) (Both Directions) at the junction of Wedmore Gardens by Upper Holloway station - The carriageway is restricted in both directions during bridge replacement works.Temporary traffic signals may be in operation.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Delays possible whilst these works are in place.

RoadDisruption.Comments: [A102] Blackwall Tunnel (E14) (Southbound) - Each Sunday between 01:00 - 08:00. There will be a full northbound closure for routine maintenance. The northbound traffic flow will be maintained, southbound traffic is diverted to other river crossings. Works will not be taking place Sunday 22nd February but are to resume Sunday 1st March.

LIMEHOUSE LINK TUNNEL (Both Directions) - closed between 2200hrs and 0600hrs, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday nights for maintenance works. Please note, no closures on Thursday April 2 and Tuesday 26 May.
East India Dock Tunnel (Both Direction) - closed between 2200 and 0600 Monday night during maintenance. Please note, Bank Holiday Monday 25 May closure is postponed until the night of Tuesday 26 May.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Tunnel has reopened in both directions.

RoadDisruption.Comments: [A1] Holloway Road (N5 /N7) (Both Directions) at the junction of Highbury Corner - Holloway Road will be reduced to one lane in each direction due to a bridge replacement scheme.
Woolwich Ferry (Both Directions) - lane restrictions at both ferry terminals during refurbishment of the boarding ramps.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Delays possible while restrictions are in place.

RoadDisruption.Comments: [A3] Arthur Street (EC4R) (Both Directions) between Martin Lane and King William Street - the road will be closed to enable utility diversion works from 23rd February 2015 to 1800hrs 20th April 2016 - At present the road remains open
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Drivers are advised to seek alternate routes once closure is in place.

RoadDisruption.Comments: A1205 Burdett Road (North and Southbound) at the junction of St Paul's Way - The carriageway will be restricted for Crossrail works.
[A501] Moorgate (EC2M) (Southbound) at the junction of Ropemaker Street - The road is closed due to Crossrail Works in the area.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Traffic is slow on diversion. Expect delays in the area.

RoadDisruption.Comments: Strand Tunnel - Tunnel closed to facilitate routine maintenance.

[A20] Loampit Vale (SE13) (Westbound) between Molesworth Street / Lewisham High Street and Thurston Road (Lewisham Gateway Development Works) - intermittent carriageway restrictions due to works on the pavement. Intermittent lane closures on all approaches to the Lewisham northern roundabout.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Traffic is flowing well at present.

RoadDisruption.Comments: [A406] North Circular Road (NW11) (Westbound) between Bridge Lane and Golders Green Road - Lanes one and two (of three) will be closed between 2200 and 0500 each weekday night during repairs to woodlands wall.
[A3211] Victoria Embankment (EC4Y) (Eastbound) at the junction of Temple Avenue - The exit slip road to Blackfriars Bridge is partially restricted for crane works.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Delays possible whilst works are in place.

RoadDisruption.Comments: A11 (E1 /E3 ) (Both Directions) between Bow Roundabout and Aldgate - There will be lane restrictions and at times temporary traffic signals due to Cycle Super Highway 2 upgrade works. Works will take place in phases. From 17th Feb to 6th March between 2100hrs and 0500hrs there will be temporary traffic signals in operation at the junction with Burdett Road
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Restrictions in place between 2100hrs and 0500hrs only until March. Delays are possible between these times.

RoadDisruption.Comments: A40 New Oxford Street (Westbound) at the junction with Earnshaw Street - There will be intermittent lane restrictions due to ongoing Crossrail works.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: Delays possible when restrictions are in place.

RoadDisruption.Comments: A4202 Park Lane (Northbound) at the junction with Stanhope Gate - The coach parking bays are suspended northbound at Stanhope Gate for Crossrail works.
RoadDisruption.CurrentUpdate: The bay remains closed. Extra coach parking places are north of the restriction.
